pages.text: $(o)"The Harbinger was born out of the Night... Chin up, or don't. In the end, what matters the most is what the Harbinger says, and he says that for all nights to end, the nights must begin first."$()

pages.title: Symbol
pages.text: This symbol is created with $(l:alchemy/entry_essence_night)Essence of the Night$() in the $(l:glory/entry_rite_glorious)Glorious Rite$().$(br)When active, this deity will spawn monsters, though this happens at a high cost of OE.
